articles.title: Pfizer’s COVID booster spurs immune response to new omicron subvariants - NJ.com
articles.description: With relatives of BA.5 now on the rise, the question was: How will the new boosters hold up?
articles.content:
Pfizers updated COVID-19 booster may offer some protection against newly emerging omicron mutants even though its not an exact match, the pharmaceutical company announced Friday.
